name: Sort Paragraphs
description: Arrange paragraphs in correct order. Great for process ordering, story sequencing, and logical flow exercises.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate paragraphs in correct order

schema.taskDescription: string - Instructions for the sorting task
schema.paragraphs: array of strings - Paragraphs in CORRECT order

example.taskDescription: Arrange the steps of photosynthesis in the correct order.
paragraphs: Light energy is absorbed by chlorophyll in the leaves.
Water molecules are split, releasing oxygen.
Carbon dioxide from the air enters through stomata.
The light energy converts CO2 and water into glucose.
Glucose is used by the plant for energy and growth.

h5p_params_format.taskDescription: Arrange the steps of photosynthesis in the correct order.

paragraphs.text: Light energy is absorbed by chlorophyll in the leaves.
Carbon dioxide from the air enters through stomata.
The light energy converts CO2 and water into glucose.
Glucose is used by the plant for energy and growth.

conversion_notes.order_preservation: AI provides paragraphs in CORRECT order - H5P will shuffle for display
conversion_notes.paragraph_structure: Each paragraph is an object with 'text' property

scoring_modes.transitions: Score based on correct adjacent pairs
scoring_modes.positions: Score based on correct absolute positions
